name: Pen-Run
description:
This game is made in Pico-8 (first time using it!) by me, and is my contribution for the game jam  Mini Jam 99: Birds

All sprites, coding and sounds are made by me.

Special thanks to my rubber ducks  LordDz and BobThe Hacker!

And also thanks to my not-yet-born baby which drove me to participate in this jam, baby will arrive any day! #9monthspregnant <3
